Class MemberRepository

java.lang.Object
persistence.MemberRepository
public class MemberRepository extends Object
In-memory repository for Member entities.

Provides basic operations for storing and looking up members.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MemberRepository()
    Creates a new MemberRepository with empty storage.

      public MemberRepository()
      Creates a new MemberRepository with empty storage.

  • Method Details

    • addMember

      public static void addMember(Member member)
      Adds a new member to the repository if not already present.
      Parameters:
      member - the Member object to add

    • findAll

      public static List<Member> findAll()
      Retrieves a list of all registered members.
      Returns:
      a copy of the list of all members

    • findMemberByEmail

      public static Member findMemberByEmail(String userName)
      Finds a member by userName/ Email (case-insensitive).
      Parameters:
      userName - the member's userName
      Returns:
      the matching Member or null if not found

    • findById

      public static Member findById(String memberId)
      Finds a member by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the member's unique ID
      Returns:
      the matching Member or null if not found

    • removeMember

      public static boolean removeMember(Member member)
      Removes a member from the repository.
      Parameters:
      member - the Member to remove
      Returns:
      true if successfully removed, false otherwise

    • clearMembers

      public static void clearMembers()
      Clears all members from the repository (useful for testing).
